rows.label: qst201603_msg0001
rows.name: A moment of friends' time, please?

rows.label: qst201603_msg0002
rows.name: Me-Mo-mo? Who is friend?

rows.label: qst201603_msg0003
rows.name: Me am Kupitapi, music producer.

rows.label: qst201603_msg0004
rows.name:
Some people find name bit on nose,
so instead everyone call me Teetapz.
Pleased to make acquaintance.

rows.label: qst201603_msg0005
rows.name:
Right, so, uh... Teetapz,
what do you want?

rows.label: qst201603_msg0006
rows.name:
Want? Oh, me just become captivated
by song of this here young lady...

rows.label: qst201603_msg0007
rows.name: Young lady... You mean Nanakoori?

rows.label: qst201603_msg0008
rows.name: Oh-ho! So name of friend is Nanakoori!

rows.label: qst201603_msg0009
rows.name:
Friend Nanakoori, me feel
enraptured when hear your song!

rows.label: qst201603_msg0010
rows.name:
Teetapz think friend's song could
bring all of Alst to knees!

rows.label: qst201603_msg0011
rows.name:
What friend think? How about
capture hearts of world with me?

rows.label: qst201603_msg0013
rows.name:
Friend Nanakoori! Your
song have immense power!

rows.label: qst201603_msg0014
rows.name:
...I... Couldn't possibly...
I'm too... shy...and it's
all just too much...

rows.label: qst201603_msg0015
rows.name:
Nonnon, please! Such wonderful
song deserve to be sung!

rows.label: qst201603_msg0016
rows.name: Me sure everything go splendidly!

rows.label: qst201603_msg0018
rows.name:
...Why don't you give
it a try, Nanakoori?

rows.label: qst201603_msg0019
rows.name: B-but...

rows.label: qst201603_msg0020
rows.name: No, I agree! Just do it!

rows.label: qst201603_msg0021
rows.name:
You're shy, and that's fine,
but this'd be a chance to
try something different!

rows.label: qst201603_msg0022
rows.name:
That's...true, but I didn't think
I needed anything different...

rows.label: qst201603_msg0023
rows.name:
You've all become my friends,
and it's great to just talk...

rows.label: qst201603_msg0024
rows.name:
And I've been holding my own in
battles, helping our side...

rows.label: qst201603_msg0025
rows.name: But the idea of singing just feels...

rows.label: qst201603_msg0026
rows.name:
Fine! Is fine! Tora also want
to hear Nanakoori sing more.

rows.label: qst201603_msg0027
rows.name: I wouldn't mind another listen either.

rows.label: qst201603_msg0028
rows.name:
...Mmm... If you're all
sure...then... I guess I
could give it a try...

rows.label: qst201603_msg0029
rows.name:
That great news! Then let us
make preparations quickly!

rows.label: qst201603_msg0030
rows.name:
Studio of Teetapz is located
in Avaritia, not far from
Harapekko Canteen.

rows.label: qst201603_msg0031
rows.name:
Me go on ahead and lay plans.
When friends ready, come meet!

rows.label: qst201603_msg0032
rows.name: Hey, Miss!

rows.label: qst201603_msg0033
rows.name: You'll be singing again, won't you?

rows.label: qst201603_msg0034
rows.name: Yes, it... seems I will...

rows.label: qst201603_msg0035
rows.name: Then here! Take this Torigonda.

rows.label: qst201603_msg0036
rows.name: Huh?

rows.label: qst201603_msg0037
rows.name:
You played her with such joy and
zeal, I think she'd be more than
happy for you to use her again!

rows.label: qst201603_msg0038
rows.name: Are you sure...?

rows.label: qst201603_msg0039
rows.name:
I toldja before, didn't I?
We make Torigondas, so we've
got loads more back home.

rows.label: qst201603_msg0040
rows.name:
Da said it was a masterpiece when
he'd finished it, but with so many
he won't even notice it's gone.

rows.label: qst201603_msg0041
rows.name: That's... Mmm...

rows.label: qst201603_msg0042
rows.name:
Don't worry about it, I
say. Anyway, you'll need
an instrument, won't you?

rows.label: qst201603_msg0043
rows.name:
...Okay then. But let's
just call it a loan.

rows.label: qst201603_msg0044
rows.name: I'll be sure to return it some day.

rows.label: qst201603_msg0045
rows.name: It really needn't be a big deal...

rows.label: qst201603_msg0046
rows.name:
But fine, as you wish! If that's
what you want, Miss, then okay.

rows.label: qst201603_msg0047
rows.name: Mmm. Thank you...

rows.label: qst201603_msg0048
rows.name:
I really hope I can hear you
play again sometime soon!
